name: Mutiny Monday
description: You are a low level security guard assigned to guard the entrance of a large, secret UAC research base. Over the radio you hear some cries for help from one of your buddies. Apparently, high level security guards have seized the base in an attempt to keep anything coming through the teleporters from escaping, and as a bonus, they've killed all the low level staff stationed at Reception. Looks like you're the only one who can stop these mutinous guards from getting away with this. Maybe you can also find out what they were trying to keep out...
